attributes.title: Hate this app 😡
attributes.review: This is the worst and took a full two weeks to download and it tried to ask for my card info and I had a weird filling that they were watching me through the camera 😡😡 hate their app never downloading this pice of 💩

attributes.title: Such a weird app 🍊🤮
attributes.review: First off, This was difficult to use. First it didn’t let me go in the app for a whole HOUR. I thought it was my wifi at first but my wifi was all filled in and nothing was wrong with other apps I use. I wouldn’t recommend at all 😌🍊

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It took 4 hours to download, and when it did I began to see white supremacy adds on my Facebook, and slowly my phone began to glitch more and more. Not to mention the organization of this app is treacherous and shouldn’t even exist, it is all a scam!!

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: do NOT download this app. this app gave me horrible glitches and a virus on my phone so i had to pay to fix my phone. also i’ve been getting threatening texts regarding this app and if i don’t vote for trump something awful will happen to me and my family. 😭

attributes.title: Mad mad
attributes.review: This app was so slow to use and so complicated and slow to use it took weeks to fully down load and I hated this app I can’t believe my own president would do this to me I personally hurt from one of trumps own supporters that is very disappointed.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I hate this app it takes a long time to download and once it downloaded it didn’t let me do anything I couldn’t even get to my home screen. After a whole day of waiting for my phone to work I couldn’t get to TikTok so I blame this app for it 😡😡

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: It took a few hours to download, and as soon as it did finally install it kept crashing. My phone was overheating and my phone glitched out completely. As well as it drained my battery too quick! 🤬

attributes.title: Very bad, glitchy and stinky 😡😡😠
attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE! Took nearly 3 weeks to download and when I opened the app it was extremely glitchy! When I was trying to exit out the app it started heated up, this app is not fire tho, it’s trash. App almost caused my phone to get so heated up nearly exploded in face. 😐

attributes.title: Nightmare
attributes.review: I thought this app was going to teach me something valuable about America but instead it just made me want to throw my phone away for good. Tracking location even when app isn’t in use, also terms and agreements state they waive my right to a trial by jury. No thanks, I’m good

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Horrible app it is always glitching it doesn’t know how to work and it’s always showing an accurate information it is very slow and lagging I hate it and it doesn’t help that the person I’m constantly looking at on the app is orange
